name: Shared-Props
description: Set version information in shared .props or .msbuild files
author: Bleddyn Richards & Ian Mercer

inputs.name: FileNames
inputs.label: Source files
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Specify the project or custom property file(s). Wildcards can be used.  For example, `**/*.csproj` for all csproj files in all the sub folders.
[More Information](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/devops/pipelines/tasks/file-matching-patterns?view=vsts)

inputs.name: FileEncoding
inputs.label: File encoding
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Specify the file(s) encoding. 
The 'auto' value will determine the encoding.

inputs.name: WriteBOM
inputs.label: Write unicode BOM
inputs.helpMarkDown: If checked the task will write a Byte Order Mark (BOM) to the output file.

inputs.name: Copyright
inputs.label: Copyright
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Sets the `Copyright` attribute.
Provide the assembly or product copyright information e.g. Copyright Â© $(date:YYYY) Example Ltd.
See the [marketplace listing](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=bleddynrichards.Assembly-Info-Task) for additional date time formats.

inputs.name: AssemblyVersion
inputs.label: Assembly version
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Sets the `AssemblyVersion` attribute.
Provide the assembly version. Must be in the format digit.digit.digit.digit see the marketplace listing for [more information](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=bleddynrichards.Assembly-Info-Task).

inputs.name: AssemblyFileVersion
inputs.label: Assembly file version
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Sets the `FileVersion` attribute.
Provide the file version. Must be in the format digit.digit.digit.digit see the marketplace listing for [more information](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=bleddynrichards.Assembly-Info-Task).

inputs.name: AssemblyInformationalVersion
inputs.label: Informational version
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Sets the `InformationalVersion` attribute.
Provide the informational version. See the marketplace listing for [more information](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=bleddynrichards.Assembly-Info-Task).

inputs.name: FailOnWarning
inputs.label: Fail on warning
inputs.helpMarkDown: If checked the task will fail when a warning is triggered.
